snippet: Jim Powell is grim as he looks over the acres of destroyed oranges around him, the leaves of the trees curled and burned by frost.   "There's no question it's a disaster," he says. "It's probably as bad a disaster as any that's happened to this ar...
lead_paragraph: Jim Powell is grim as he looks over the acres of destroyed oranges around him, the leaves of the trees curled and burned by frost. "There's no question it's a disaster," he says. "It's probably as bad a disaster as any that's happened to this area."

headline.main: After Freeze, Counting Losses to Orange Crop
